commit.message:
decl.c (grokdeclarator): Do not depend on C99's _Bool's behavior.

2004-06-11  Andrew Pinski  <pinskia@physics.uc.edu>

        * decl.c (grokdeclarator): Do not depend on C99's _Bool's behavior.
